body.name: GermGuardian Air Purifier with Genuine HEPA 13 Pet Pure Filter, Removes 99.97% of Pollutants, Covers Large Rooms up to 915 Sq. ft. in 1 Hour, UV-C Light Helps Reduce Germs, 28", Black, AC5250PT
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 48 mins
features: ✅【HIGH PERFORMANCE】 Circulates the air 1x per hour in 915 square foot rooms and 4.8x per hour in 189 sq. ft rooms, making it ideal for medium to large sized rooms such as: dorm rooms, bedrooms, and other living areas!
✅【AIR PURIFIER FOR HOME】 True HEPA air filter reduces up to 99.97% of harmful germs, dust, pollen, pet dander, mold spores, and other allergens as small as 0.1 microns from the air
✅【FIGHTS GERMS】 UV-C light helps reduce airborne viruses such as influenza, staph, rhinovirus, and works to reduce volatile organic compounds
✅【TRAPS ALLERGENS】 Pre-filter traps dust, pet hair, and other large particles while extending the life of the HEPA filter
✅【PET PURE FILTER】An antimicrobial agent is added to the filter to inhibit the growth of mold, mildew, and odor-causing bacteria on the filter's surface

✅【ZERO OZONE CERTIFIED】 Ultraviolet - C (UV-C) acts as the ultimate line of defense, helping reduce airborne germs such as Staphylococcus Albus, Escherichia Coli, Aspergillus Niger, and Phi-X174 as well as airborne bacteria and mold spores*
✅【REDUCES ODORS】 Activated charcoal filter helps to reduce unwanted odors from pets, smoke, cooking fumes, and more
body.description: Product Description The Tower Air Purifier is perfect for allergy sufferers. The HEPA Pet Pure Filter captures 99.97% of allergens including pet dander, dust mites, and pollen. The Pet Pure is an antimicrobial agent added to the filter to inhibit the growth of mold, mildew and odor-causing bacteria on the surface of the filter. More than just a filter, UV-C light helps reduce airborne bacteria, viruses, mold spores*, and works to reduce volatile organic compounds. Circulates the air 1x per hour in 915 square foot rooms and 4.8x per hour in 189 sq. ft rooms, making it ideal for medium to large sized rooms such as: dorm rooms, bedrooms, and other living areas! The easy to use digital display panel includes UV-C control, a filter change indicator, and an up to 8 hour timer. 5 speeds provide high speed allergen control down to ultra-quiet sleep mode. *Tested with Staphylococcus Albus, and Escherichia Coli, Aspergillus Niger, and Phi-X174 Brand Story By

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pet Pure HEPA Filter Meticulously designed to tackle pet dander, hair, fur, allergens and odors with exceptional efficiency, capturing up to 99.97% of particles down to 0.1 micron. The perfect solution for pet owners seeking cleaner and fresher indoor air. Turbo Charge your Refresh Sanitizing UV-C Light reduces germs, viruses and bacteria and before releasing the cleaner, fresher air back into the room. Helps reduce the .03% of microbes HEPA filters leave behind. Fits Neatly in Corners & Tight Spaces Standing 28 inches tall, it is ideal for use in rooms up to 915 sq. feet. Breathe Easy From the Living Room to the Kitchen, Bedroom to the Mudroom, an Air of Confidence allows you to breathe a deep, clean sigh of satisfaction.

Zero Ozone Certified All Guardian Technologies Air Purifiers with UV-C are tested and Zero Ozone Certified by Intertek Sustainability. Ozone is typically produced at wavelengths below 240nm. Guardian UV-C lights use a special quartz glass that filers out these ozone wavelengths. UV-C offers a chemical-free approach to disinfection and sanitization. Engineered and Designed in Ohio, USA At Guardian Technologies, our products undergo rigorous scientific testing performed by respected, independent labs in the United States and overseas. Guardian Technologies exceeds the most stringent industry standards to provide cleaner indoor air. Since 2005, our team has embarked on a mission to revolutionize the air purifier industry through the creation and construction of top-notch air quality products . ETL Listed Energy Star Certified CARB Compliant RoHS Compliant Zero Ozone Certified

GermGuardian Filter C Pet Pure HEPA Genuine Replacement Filter GermGuardian Filter C HEPA Pure Genuine Replacement Filter GermGuardian Filter C Smoke Clear HEPA Genuine Replacement Filter GermGuardian Filter C Toxin Clear HEPA Genuine Replacement Filter GermGuardian FLT28CB4 Genuine Carbon Filter Replacements Air Purifiers, 4-Pack GermGuardian Genuine UV-C Replacement Bulb AC5000 & AC5250PT Air Purifiers Model FLT5250PT FLT5000 FLT5000SM FLT5000VO FLT28CB4 LB5000 Primary Filter Type HEPA - True HEPA - True HEPA - True HEPA - True HEPA - True UV-C Filter Description Pet Pure HEPA Filter is meticulously designed to tackle pet dander, hair, and odors. HEPA Pure Filter Removes 99.97% of particles down to 0.1 microns such as dust and allergens. Smoke Clear HEPA Filter is designed to effectively combat wildfire smoke and fume odors. Toxin Clear HEPA Filter is treated to clean the air of common VOCs and harmful gases found in everyday byproducts. The carbon filter attacks smoke, cooking and pet odors along with harmful VOC's. It helps to lengthen the life of your HEPA filter. UV-C light helps reduce airborne bacteria, viruses, mold spores* and works with Titanium Dioxide to reduce volatile organic compounds. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very effective and quiet
reviews.reviewText: The price point was very good, and it works well to filter out airborne yuck. It's large enough to get the job done, but small enough so it's not overbearing in my living room decor. Very good for the price..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works so well I bought 2!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great air purifier particularly if you have pet(s). I t works very well and quite low noise. It has 5 settings for how much air you want, only on 5 is a bit too loud. I use 3 and 4 most of the time. I have one in the bedroom and one in the living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Clears out the air, but gets a little loud on high fan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and Efficient
reviews.reviewText: Slim design fits in a room without being bulky or very noticeable as far as size goes. I have the tall and short machine. It is loud such like a fan on medium/high when it is on its high setting. I've set mine on power 3 (which is like the medium setting) and it seems to do the job. This is why four stars but these things are going to make noise but it becomes ambient. I have it in my master and my kitchen next to the rabbit hutch.It has cut down the odor from kitchen garbage and rabbit liter box exponentially. Also im not seeing things flying in the air when I sweep such like before. I have two dogs as well and dust has been cut down. Cuts down dander.About the smell: After a week with full garbage and rabbit liter pan, the smell before air cleaner was an 8/10 as far as those smells progress as the week goes. Once using the air purifier it is a 2/10 after a week if i did not exchange the liter pan and have a full garbage and/or dirty dishes. Definitely worth the money and I think it is very fair priced. I did not skimp on the filters as with any nock off it compromises the efficiency of the product.Used in open floor plan about 750sq. Ft with single rabbit and two dogs that use the laundry room as their space which is also open to kitchen/living room. Single women house hold, one kiddo in country.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as it should.
reviews.reviewText: I am impressed with the quality of this for sure. It’s a very large machine, which I wasn’t expecting. That’s my fault has I didn’t read the dimensions. I’m 5’8” tall and this beast comes up past mid-thigh.It’s very quiet on the lower speeds so it works well when I’m watching TV or have the radio on. Of course the higher the fan speed, the louder it becomes.I have a dog and two birds, so I looked for soemthing with a special pet filter. This machine has an impressive amount of different filters.I noticed a difference in the air within an hour.The only complaint I have is about the freakishly bright lights on it. When the UV light is on, there is a very bright blue light around the front top of the unit. There is no way I would be able to sleep with that light on in my bedroom. That feature can be switched off but the really bright red light (indicating the unit is on) is on all the time.Other than the two lights, I’m happy with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing machine! I have disabled cats that like to pee outside their box and this machine has killed the cst pee odor in 3 days! I highly recommend this machine it's amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works great! I bought extra filters so I can change them easily. I thought the unit would be larger and planned on buying two of the smaller units to go with it. I will be going for two more the same as this and won't have to worry about different filters. Perfect solution to keeping particles from drifting in the air.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it and it lasts for years.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using my Germ Guardian Air Purifier for 2 1/2 years and it's still working great. This is by far the best air purifier I've ever had and believe me I've tried a lot of them. I tried the Winix that cost almost twice as much as my Germ Guardian but it came no where close to working half as good. The filters aren't to expensive and last. I even bought a different air purifier from HSN with no luck. I will be staying with this Air Purifier. The one thing It has is the UV light that others don't have and with that combo it cleans the air better than all the other kind. If you can't decide on which Air Purifier you want just go for this one and you want regret it.
